headline: Honeywell Finalizes Sundyne Acquisition to Boost Its Process Industry Strength
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. On June 9, the company announced that it had finalized its $2.16 billion all-cash acquisition of Sundyne from private equity firm Warburg Pincus. Sundyne, known for its advanced pumps and gas compressors used in process industries, is expected to contribute immediately […]

headline: Ransomware attacks pile up in disturbing trend
summary: Extortion attempts leap by 46% over a recent six-month period, with manufacturing and construction sectors bearing the brunt.

headline: Honeywell: Good Execution, Secular Growth Exposure, And Strategic M&As To Drive Upside
summary: Honeywell's growth in high-demand sectors, strong backlog, and strategic M&A drive revenue visibility. Read why HON stock is a Buy.
